name: Freight-in & shipping on purchases
notes: Inbound freight and shipping related to purchases

name: Warehousing & distribution (COGS)
notes: Warehousing and distribution costs tied to production

name: Royalties & production fees
notes: Royalties and licensing tied to product sales

name: Marketplace selling fees (Amazon/Shopify)
notes: Seller fees linked to product sales (Amazon + Shopify; etc.)

name: Total external charges
notes: Total of all external operating expenses

name: Depreciation & amortization
notes: Depreciation & amortization of PPE and intangibles

name: Finance costs
notes: Interest expense; loan costs; financing fees

name: Foreign exchange gain/loss
notes: Gains or losses on currency exchange

name: Other financial gains or losses
notes: Other financial gains and losses not elsewhere classified
